name: Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees
name_original: Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees
description:
Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by LucasArts Entertainment. It came out on 06-05-2005. LucasArts Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Star Wars Galaxies: Rage of the Wookiees on PC.
